desc: Louisiana Triple Threat is most versatile umbrella rig on the market for bass fishing, red fishing, crappie / perch / sac-a-lait fishing, or any other predatory fish fishing! Umbrella rig has three hooks, a spinner blade, and folds compactly to fit in standard tackle trays, eliminating storing issues of umbrella rigs.

layout.text:
EXPAND YOUR ARSENAL WITH A TRIPLE THREAT!
The most versatile and compact umbrella rig on the market!
